post:
**[Limitless Hosting](https://limitlesshost.net)** provides affordable, and quality shared/reseller hosting. It was found in 2015 and used to provide other digital services such as game server hosting.

**Website**: https://limitlesshost.net

We have brought some amazing special offers for LET users, starting from **$3.6/year**!
All discounts are RECURRING! Pay same price on every renewal.

**Web Hosting Offers:**
**XS Shared Hosting**
- 1 GB SSD
- 50 GB Bandwidth
- 1 Addon Domain
- 5 MySQL Database
Price: **$3.6/year**
Order USA Hosting: https://my.limitlesshost.net/order/config/index/usahosting-da/?group_id=39&pricing_id=303&coupon=LETDA40
Order EU Hosting: https://my.limitlesshost.net/order/config/index/de-sharedhosting/?group_id=33&pricing_id=246&coupon=LETDA40


**Medium Shared Hosting**

Order EU Hosting: https://my.limitlesshost.net/order/config/index/de-sharedhosting/?group_id=33&pricing_id=252&coupon=LETDA40

Shared Hosting: LETDA40
Reseller Hosting: LETRESELLER50

**Features:**

- Limitless Email Accounts

- CloudLinux
- SSD, NVME SSD for USA only

- One-Click Web Installer (Softaculous)
